content.raw: Could you demonstrate that reading in areas not described by the AGP file to contain NaNs? Or possibly show an error output when loading in data that spans past the area the AGP describes? You only would have to use the first few lines of the AGP file you used above.
content.html: Could you demonstrate that reading in areas not described by the AGP file to contain NaNs? Or possibly show an error output when loading in data that spans past the area the AGP describes? You only would have to use the first few lines of the AGP file you used above.
